data: “Well,” said Comyns, “I can’t see for the life of me what makes you want to linger on in this benighted hole.”
“WELL,” said Comyns, “I can’t see for the life of me what makes you want to linger on in this benighted hole.”
H. De Vere (Henry De Vere) Stacpoole
Stacpoole, H. De Vere (Henry De Vere), 1863-1951
